definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: The congruences on a regular semigroup is completely determined by its idempotent congruence classes.
sentences.chinese: 正則半羣上的同餘是由其冪等元同餘類所完全決定的。
